Hi, I'm Aleksandar

I develop flexible, well-structured and highly interactive websites & web apps.

View My Work

I Specialize In

Developing highly interactive web applications using technologies such as HTML5 & CSS3, JavaScript, Node.js and React

Concepting

Shaping the idea to be highly specific, market validation, identifying the necessary and proper tools for the job and segregating each goal into smaller doable steps.

Clean Code

Clean code should be pleasing to read. Each function, each class and module should expose a single-minded attitude that remains entirely unpolluted by the surrounding details.

Visual Design

Simplicity always works in an effective web page design. Clean and fresh design not only makes the website appealing but also helps the user navigate from one page to another seamlessly.

Interaction

Highlighting the various features and modules created using the necessary tools to ensure visitors and users can interract wit the website effortlessly.

My Creative Process

All of my websites and web applications are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I want

1

Discuss The Project

Brainstorming, discussing the creative process, the necessary technologies and how we would like to proceed with the project.

2

Conceptualization

Shaping the idea to be highly specific, market validation, identifying the proper tools for the job and segregating each goal into smaller doable steps.

3

Outline and Sketch Out

Interaction and Execution
